name: Prym Darning Mushroom
short_description: Wooden darning mushroom for darning holes with darning thread Toadstool design Suitable for darning larger holes in fabric or wool
product_description: Prym offers the classic darning mushroom in the design of a toadstool. With it also the darning of larger holes is no longer a problem. Especially with quality clothing or lovingly hand-knitted socks, scarves or hats, nobody wants to do without them even if a part is worn out. With the properly matched darning thread, the corresponding darning needle and the wooden darning mushroom, nothing stands in the way of repairing beloved garments. The handy attachable style of the mushroom serves as an ergonomic grip, enabling effortless work.

name: The Quilted Bear - Magnetic Mushroom Darner & Needles for Quick and Easy Mending - Durable, Efficient, and Versatile Tools for Sewing, Embroidery, and Crafting Projects
short_description: Magnetic Base: The Mushroom Darner features a magnetic base that securely holds the included sewing needles. No more fumbling around or searching for misplaced needles! The magnetic base keeps your needles organized and easily accessible, allowing for effortless stitching and quick needle changes. Ergonomic Design: Crafted with comfort in mind, the Mushroom Darner boasts an ergonomic handle that fits snugly in your hand. Its lightweight design reduces hand fatigue, ensuring extended periods of comfortable sewing. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned seamstress, this tool will provide an enjoyable and pain-free stitching experience. Versatile Needle Assortment: This set includes an assortment of high-quality sewing needles to cater to various sewing projects. From general stitching to intricate embroidery, the Mushroom Darner has you covered. With a range of needle sizes and types, you'll have the right tool at your fingertips for any sewing task. Darning Capability: The Mushroom Darner is not just limited to sewing. Its darning capabilities allow you to repair and reinforce fabrics with ease. Whether you need to mend a small hole or reinforce a worn-out area, this tool enables you to achieve professional-quality results quickly and effortlessly. Portable and Compact: The Mushroom Darner is designed to be portable and travel-friendly. Its compact size allows you to carry it with you wherever your creativity takes you. Slip it into your sewing kit or project bag, and you'll always have a reliable tool at hand, whether you're attending a sewing class, visiting a friend, or simply sewing on the go.
